result.execSummary:
The defendant Shotan K. Gibson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Criminal Damage to Property, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant to pay costs and DNA surcharge within 60 days (5/22/15) or request a payment plan through the Dodge County Clerk of Courts office within said time.

in Dodge County Jail with Huber and Transfer consecutive to any sentence previously imposed.  Defendant is entitled to 35 days presentence credit.
Consecutive to: any sentence previously imposed

records.addlTxt: Stipulation & Recommendation & Order  to Pay Restitution
from Atty Terry - Agreement to Restitution, no hearing needed
Restitution hearing on May 20, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Shotan K. Gibson in court, in custody with attorney Catherine Jane Terry. Gilbert Thompson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. victim rights compliance; Court reviews GPQPA & WOR; Court reviews charge/penalties; Court reviews recomm. - repeater to be dismissed; Def. pleads NC to CDTP; parties stip. to facts; Court finds plea made FVK&I and finds Def. guilty of CDTP (repeater removed); State heard; dispute on restitution (glasses); Atty. Terry heard - was on ATR until Sept., then hold on another case and had Initial 2/16/15 on this case, requests 35 days credit; Court imposes sentence; Def. remanded

* 90 days in DCJ w/H&Tr. cons. - Def. is entitled to 35 days credit
* $243 CC w/in 60 days
* $200 DNA surcharge w/in 60 days
* Rest. held open for 30 days (hearing to be held if no agreement reached)
Defendant shall not have any violent or abusive contact with anyone.  Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.

ADDRESS INFO for Shotan K. Gibson
Current: 216 W. Center Street, c/o Dodge County Jail, Juneau, WI 53039   (Effective: 01-26-2015)
Prior: Dodge Co Detention Facilty 216 W. Center Street, Juneau, WI 53039

9:00 - Defendant Shotan K. Gibson in court, in custody with attorney Catherine Jane Terry.  Gilbert Grant Thompson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant has received copy of Criminal Complaint and advised of rights, charges and penalties. Atty Terry enters Not Guilty plea. Court finds probable cause. RD & JT set. Court sets $500 Cash bond with conditions:   Defendant shall not have any violent or abusive contact with anyone.   Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.  Return date scheduled for March 16, 2015 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for April 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.
